deposit(address,uint256).details: Deposits funds into the lending protocol

params.asset: The address of the underlying asset to deposit

getReserveData(address).details: Returns the state and configuration of the reserve

supply(address,uint256,address,uint16).details: Supplies an amount of an asset to the protocol

params.asset: The address of the asset to supply
params.onBehalfOf: The address that will receive the aTokens
params.referralCode: Referral code for tracking and rewards

withdraw(address,uint256,address).details: Withdraws an amount of an asset from the protocol

params.asset: The address of the asset to withdraw
params.to: The address that will receive the withdrawn assets
